sql:
SELECT deviceid,
       Datetime(timestamp, 'localtime') AS timestamp,
       friendlyName,
       batVoltage,
       batpercentage,
       batPercentageCoulomb,
       coulombCount,
       batcurrent,
       maxchargecurrent,
       tempinaxp192,
       powermode,
       currentbrightness,
       currentscreen,
       webportalactive,
       ntp,
       ssid,
       rssi,
       ip,
       hostname
FROM   devicestatuslog T1
WHERE  1 = 1
       AND EXISTS (SELECT 1
                   FROM   devicestatuslog T2
                   WHERE  T1.deviceid = T2.deviceid
                          AND T2.timestamp >= Datetime('now', '-2 minutes')
                   GROUP  BY T2.deviceid
                   HAVING T1.timestamp = Max(t2.timestamp))
name: Select Recent
